description: TEHRAN, Apr. 11 (MNA) \xe2\x80\x93 Iranian short animated piece \xe2\x80\x98Mr. Deer\xe2\x80\x99 directed by Mojtaba Mousavi has won the \xe2\x80\x98Skeptyricon Special Award\xe2\x80\x99 at the 10th Skepto International Film Festival in Italy.
text:
\xe2\x80\x98Mr. Deer\xe2\x80\x99 is a 20-minute stop motion animation which utilizes the puppet technique to narrate a story set in an unknown time, in a ruined subway station which is similar to those in modern European societies. People in this society have animal faces and have forgotten humanity.
\r
\r
The short animated film directed by Mojtaba Mousavi won the \xe2\x80\x98Skeptyricon Special Award\xe2\x80\x99 at the 10th edition of Skepto International Film Festival in Italy.
\r
\r
The festival is focused on short films, and aims to encourage and give exposure to independent filmmakers from all over the world, according to its website. It also means to become a cultural reference point for the city of Cagliari and to widen its horizons to other Italian, European and Mediterranean cities.
\r
\r
The 10 edition of the event was held on 3-6 April 2019 in the Italian city of Cagliari.
\r
\r
MS/4587219
\r
title: \xe2\x80\x98Mr. Deer\xe2\x80\x99 wins award at Italy\xe2\x80\x99s Skepto Filmfest.
